title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1934.4 - Waiver
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1934.4 - Waiver

State Regulations

All or some of the provisions of sections
1934.1
and
1934.2
of this Part may be waived
by the corporation if, in its discretion, it determines that: (a) the eligible applicant is in conflict
with said provisions as a result of requirements of statute or governmental
agreement; or
(b) the primary
activities of the eligible applicant are unrelated to programs funded by the
corporation and that there are sufficient safeguards to protect the interests
of the proposed project and the corporation. The corporation may establish
conditions and qualifications for any such waiver issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1934.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
